BR_text.BRsummary: Screencast not working on some Windows based browsers
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
 
 User: nothing pop up when I click in the start button.
 <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
 
 Go to hamburger menu
 Click on 'record screencast'
 When the Modal opens, click on 'start recording'
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
 
 A countdown should start
 <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
 
 Nothing popup
 <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
 
 That is, did this use to work the way you expected in the past?
 yes
 <denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
 
 This comes from the community: <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/iam-not-able-to-record-a-screencast/2708>https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/iam-not-able-to-record-a-screencast/2708</denchmark-link>
